short_summary: Dermatology services for Warkworth and Bath Institutions
description: Primary Care Dermatologist service requirements for Correctional Service of Canada
full_summary:
_____________________________________________________________________________________

**Government Tender Announcement**

**Dermatology Services for the Correctional Service of Canada**

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01006381
**Solicitation Number:** 21401-25-4081757
**Publication Date:** September 7, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** September 21, 2022, 14:00:00 (EST)

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) invites Canadian contractors to provide dermatology services for the provision of primary care to inmates in the institutions of Warkworth and Bath, located in the Ontario Region. The provision of these services will be in accordance with the National Essential Health Services Framework and any amendments thereto issued by CSC during the contract period.

The Contractor must provide essential integrated, trauma-informed Primary Care dermatology services to inmates, including, but not limited to, diagnosing and treating diseases of the skin; consultation; treatment; appropriate referrals; examining skin to determine the nature of the disease; and recommending medical treatments and recommendations to the institutional primary care physician.

The services are required on a part-time basis, with the option to extend for up to two additional one-year periods. The contract term is from October 13, 2022, to October 12, 2023.

**Key Requirements:**

- Provide essential integrated, trauma-informed Primary Care dermatology services to inmates.
- Work collaboratively with the Health Services Team and other healthcare professionals.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

- Contractor's ability to provide quality dermatology services.
- Experience in providing healthcare services in a correctional institution setting.
- Ability to work independently and collaboratively with the Health Services Team.

The Request for Proposal (RFP) document is available on the Buy and Sell website (https://buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders) for downloading. Interested contractors are required to submit a proposal in accordance with the RFP document.

**Eligibility:**

This procurement is open to all interested Canadian contractors. 

**Procurement Method:**

Competitive bidding will be used to select a contractor to provide the dermatology services.

**Security Requirements:**

This contract includes security requirements that must be met by the successful contractor.

**Notice to Bidders:**

Bidders can obtain the complete statement of work and evaluation criteria by downloading the solicitation document and associated documents from the Buy and Sell website.

We look forward to reviewing your proposal. Please contact Jason Scott at Jason.Scott@csc-scc.gc.ca or 613-328
